backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (design system, navbar, hero, etc.) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, summarizing the purpose of every component, hook, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, border, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles all page sections (Navbar, Hero, Positioning, Services, Process, About, IdealClients, Investment, FAQ, FinalCTA, Footer) each wrapped in anchor-ID sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Dark two-column section presenting the studio's boutique identity on the left and three numbered guiding principles (design, build, deliver) as bordered cards on the right.
frontend/src/components/FAQ.tsx: Light section rendering four FAQs using the shadcn Accordion component with single-item expansion, gold-hover triggers, and smooth open/close animation.
frontend/src/components/FinalCTA.tsx: Dark closing section with a large display headline, three clarity statements, a mailto CTA button, and email/location contact details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark footer with a three-column grid (brand, services, quick links), smooth-scroll navigation buttons, a copyright bar with Privacy/Terms links, and a caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component displaying the main headline, value proposition bullets, and two CTA buttons ('Book a Strategy Call' and 'View Our Work') with smooth scroll navigation and a mockup image.
frontend/src/components/IdealClients.tsx: Section describing the target client types with a checklist and a qualifier card explaining the studio's positioning on pricing and fit.
frontend/src/components/Investment.tsx: Pricing section displaying a starting price of â‚¹1,50,000 with supporting copy and a CTA button that smooth-scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a 'Book a Strategy Call' CTA, scroll-based background transition, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Positioning.tsx: Dark-themed section articulating the studio's philosophy that websites must build trust, communicate authority, and convert, with impact statements and closing copy.
frontend/src/components/Process.tsx: Five-step process section rendered as a horizontal timeline on desktop and a vertical stepper on mobile, covering Discovery through Launch.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Three-card services grid covering Custom Web Design, Performance-Ready Websites, and eCommerce Development, each with a headline, description, bullet features, and a CTA link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) actors, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook for React, managing login/logout state, AuthClient creation, and identity persistence via a context provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks; currently exports nothing as the site is a static marketing page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the Digitalamiro design system with Tailwind base/utilities, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, typography (Inter + Syne fonts), and reusable utility classes for buttons, sections, and accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, display font sizes, box shadows, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the Digitalamiro marketing site's architecture, existing features, design system, and image requirements at schema version 3.
